p: Our experiments with oregano oil supplementation on advanced mobility parameters have shown that 5 and 10 min EO exposure at 37°C under 5% CO 2 significantly improves curvilinear velocity (VCL) ( Figure 4), linear velocity (VSL) ( Figure 5), mean path velocity (VAP) ( Figure 6), and displacement amplitude (ALH) ( Figure 7) of sperm cells.
